Refund Policy

We guarantee you will love your section or your paid plan or your money back.

We want you to love your new section! So, we provide a 100% refund on any section or paid plan within 30 days of the payment being invoiced by Shopify. Over 30 days? Just send us a message and we will work it out. To receive a refund, contact matt@matthewsmith.com.
